creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Parrot living in Toretsk basement. Some residents of Toretsk are living in basements of their houses in fear of russian artillery shellings. Toretsk is a small coal mine town near the frontline in Donetsk region. Since 2014, people here has been living with the war next door, as the nearest city of Horlivka was occuped by Russians. There are approximately 17 thousands people living in Toretsk and nearest villages now.
